pr_title: New module for virtual attribute adDisplayName:o365mu

timeline.bodyText: This is just a performance-related question, but wouldn't it be better to check the nullity of the cispr right away? This way, if the cispr is null, the other attribute is read and not used at all.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.bodyText: We probably don't want wildcard imports.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.bodyText: It would be nice to have the when and .then calls on separate lines, so it is easier to distinguish between those two parts.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.message:
New module for virtual attribute adDisplayName:o365mu

 - module will count display name by predefined rules
 - there is also simple test for module

timeline.author: zlamalp
